Class FMultiStageInputWizard

java.lang.Object

              com.fluidops.iwb.ajax.FMultiStageInputWizard
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.fluidops.ajax.FEventListener
public class FMultiStageInputWizard
extends com.fluidops.ajax.wizard.FWizard

A customizable wizard, consisting of a set of lazily initialized steps for statement input.

Author:
msc

Constructor Detail

FMultiStageInputWizard

public FMultiStageInputWizard(java.lang.String id,
                              org.openrdf.model.Resource subject,
                              java.util.List<org.openrdf.model.URI> types,
                              org.openrdf.repository.Repository rep,
                              boolean redirectToSubject,
                              boolean showDescriptionPage,
                              boolean saveCreationDate,
                              boolean saveCreator,
                              boolean saveLastModificationDate,
                              CodeExecution.WidgetCodeConfig onSaveMethod,
                              DataInputWidget.AfterFinishAction doAfterFinish,
                              DataInputWidget parent)
Constructor.

Parameters:
id - String The FComponent id of the wizard
subject - Resoucre The subject (to be specified if there is no ID-generating step)
types - List The types of the wizard's subject resource
rep - Repository The repository where the wizard stores data (and reads labels etc.)
redirectToSubject - boolean If set to true, the wizard redirects to the subject page after finished
saveCreationDate - boolean If set to true, the creation date is stored
onSaveMethod - Method to invoke when the input wizard is saved (may be null)

Appends a statement input group step to the wizard according to the given configuration (see class CustomizableNewInstanceWidget for a description of the config). TODO CustomizableNewInstanceWidget does not exist

Returns:
null if everything goes fine, an error label otherwise.

appendOntologyStatementInputStep

public com.fluidops.ajax.components.FLabel appendOntologyStatementInputStep()

appendCustomStatementInputStep

public com.fluidops.ajax.components.FLabel appendCustomStatementInputStep(java.lang.String title,
                                                                          java.util.List<DataInputWidget.StatementInput> customStatementInputs,
                                                                          java.lang.String errorWidgetId)
Append the custom statements section to the wizard based on the provided configuration.

Parameters:
title - the title of the wizard page
customStatementInputs - a list of DataInputWidget.StatementInput configurations
errorWidgetId - the id of the error label (in case of errors)
Returns:
an error label in case of errors or null if there was no error
